ygData.subject: A Poor Lost Perndabot
ygData.msgSnippet: You re welcome, Logo. ... Perndabot turned another corner, cursning the moment that he had entered the Cybertronian Fire. He was lost. Completely lost,

Subject: A Poor Lost Perndabot

You're welcome, Logo.

::Perndabot::

Perndabot turned another corner, cursning the moment that he had entered the 
Cybertronian Fire. He was lost. Completely lost, hopelessly lost!

His two cloaking devices were the only things that had kept him from being 
detected, and they were running low on power. He froze in his tracks as he 
hears voices, making out one to be female and one male. He listened 
carefully, catching the word "Alliance".

The huge bot's eyes narrowed, Perndabot aproaching the two bots. He was 
cloaked, and wasn't making any noise, and he hoped he would be undetected. 
Slowly aproaching the two bots that, even though he didn't know, were two 
Alliance spies in the Maximal base, he strained his audio recievers, trying 
to catch every word they said.
